current.top_heading: Thank you for placing the order at moKee!
current.pre_mess:
Within a few minutes you'll receive an email confirmation with your order's details. But hey, remember! We are here if you need anything and in case of any questions, do not hesitate to contact us at tlc@mokee.eu. 

Thank you for choosing moKee!
current.s2_des: Our focus is the safety of our products and importantly, the quality and provenance of the materials we use.  Our cots are made of FSC certified beech wood which is tough, durable and has a straight grain and texture.  Our textiles include the softest felt made from Italian wool.  We are proud to give moKee babies the finest and softest start to life.

of all our customers
current.s3_des: We want your moKee experience to be the best. We know this is an important moment in your life.

directly from our workshops
current.s4_des: That’s why our prices are always competitive!

current.s5_des: We acknowledge that was not always the case… But that’s the past… moKee has never been better!
current.s6_des: When we meet things can get silly…!

settings.heading: About us
settings.content:
A great About Us page helps builds trust between you and your customers. The more content you provide about you and your business, the more confident people will be when purchasing from your store.

Your About Us page might include:

  • Who you are
  • Why you sell the items you sell
  • Where you are located
  • How long you have been in business
  • How long you have been running your online shop
  • Who are the people on your team
  • Contact information
  • Social links (Twitter, Facebook)

To edit the content on this page, go to the Pages section of your Shopify admin.

settings.heading: MEET OUR TEAM
settings.subheading: THE RIGHT PEOPLE FOR YOUR PROJECT

settings.heading: Sumer Collection
settings.desc: This holiday season with a collection worthy of any young creative’s closet. Featuring staples ranging from T-shirts to outerwear, the items showcase an assortment of new styles and silhouettes merged with classic I Love Ugly pieces. Artist collaborations can be found throughout the range, either as a feature piece or small internal elements and details, which is an iconic characteristic of the label.

settings.heading: WE ARE MOKEE
settings.title: Handcrafted with love
settings.sub_title:
Simple, stylish, affordable, safe, environmentally friendly
and made with love - that's how we would describe our products. We create unique and fashionable solutions.
At moKee, quality and customer service always come first.

settings.question: Why can’t the Mini Cot be used as a co-sleeper?
settings.answer: Our Mini Cot can’t be used as a co-sleeper (or a shared bed), because it has not been tested for this option and has been tested to EN-716 for baby cots.

settings.question: Can I remove the front panel on all base positions?
settings.answer: The front panel can be removed only on the lowest base position.

settings.question: Can the Mini Cot be used as a bed once the baby grows up?
settings.answer: When the baby is 2 years old, you can remove the front panel and convert the cot into the toddler bed. Then you can easily transform it into a small toddler sofa which is available HERE.

settings.question: Can I use the cot's wheels & the drawer's wheels at the same time?
settings.answer: We recommend using the drawer's wheels without the cot's wheels assembled at the same time.

settings.question: Do I need extra caster wheels for the drawer?
settings.answer: No, the Mini Drawer comes with the wheels.

settings.question: What is the maximum possible load on the drawer?
settings.answer: It is 5 kg.

settings.question: Does the drawer have a lid?
settings.answer: No, the drawer does not have a lid, so we recommend using it once the mattress' base is on the lowest level.

settings.question: Can I use the cot's wheels & the drawer's wheels at the same time?
settings.answer: We recommend using the drawer's wheels without the cot's wheels assembled at the same time.

settings.question: How can I buy a replacement mattress for the WoolNest?
settings.answer: You can purchase the new mattress for your WoolNest HERE.

settings.question: Does the mattress come included with the WoolNest?
settings.answer: No

settings.question: Are the screws included in the Mini Shelves package?
settings.answer: No

settings.question: Does your natural mattress have a washable cover?
settings.answer: Our Natural Mattress cover is not removable. However, you can clean the surface: gently clean using a damp sponge and mild detergent, allow the fabric to air dry before use. The mattress cover cannot be removed or machine washed.

settings.question: What kind of mattress do you recommend?
settings.answer:
Currently we have 2 mattresses on offer: aloe vera and luxury ramen.

All are suitable for babies from birth, and their sizes are 120x60 cm and 140x70 cm.

Click HERE to compare their features and choose the best one for you & your baby!

settings.question: What company do you use to deliver orders?
settings.answer: Our orders are delivered by the courier company - UPS.

settings.question: How fast do your ship orders?
settings.answer: We aim to ship all orders the next business day. However some of our products like the Woolnest Moses Basket are handmade and may take up to 8 days to deliver during the festive holiday season. Although we do have a ready to deliver stock and aim to ship the next day. The same applies for some textiles and liners.

settings.question: Where do you deliver and how much does it cost?
settings.answer:
We ship from Europe. Most of our furniture items are heavy and costly to deliver. We offer FREE DELIVERY for all orders above £149 (below £149 the delivery costs £20) to the following countries:

 

Austria | Belgium | Bulgaria | Czech Republic | Denmark | Estonia | Finland | France* | Germany* | Hungary | Ireland | Italy* | Latvia | Lithuania | Luxembourg | Portugal | Poland | Slovakia | Slovenia | Spain* | Sweden | The Netherlands | UK*

We deliver orders to other countries/islands and the fees are as follows:

-£30/parcel: 

Balearic Islands | Sardinia | Sicilia | Jersey | Isle of Man | Liechtenstein

-  £100/parcel:
Canary Islands | Azores | Madeira | Iceland | Norway | Greece | Croatia | Gibraltar | Switzerland


We do not deliver outside of Europe.

settings.question: How can I track my order?
settings.answer:
We ship orders the next business day after placed. Once we dispatch your order, you will receive an email with a tracking number to follow the delivery online.

If you would like to receive the order's update or you would like to know when it might be shipped, do not hesitate to contact us via tlc@mokee.eu.

settings.question: Do you deliver to British Forces Post Office (BFPO)?
settings.answer: No, we do not deliver any orders to British Forces Post Office (BFPO).

settings.question: How can I check the delivery's status?
settings.answer: Once the order is shipped, we always send an email with your parcel's number. Click on it and you will be redirected to the correct website.

settings.question: Can I choose the delivery day/hour?
settings.answer: We are unable to schedule the delivery time in advance, although once the parcel reaches your country, you will be notified about an estimated delivery time and you will be able to change it if it is not suitable.

settings.question: Will I receive the notification from the courier about delivering my parcel?
settings.answer: Yes, UPS will contact you before the delivery attempt to inform about its time and to offer alternatives if needed.

settings.question: Our Returns & Refunds Policy
settings.answer:
If you changed your mind and would like to return the order or its part, follow these steps:

1. Contact us via tlc@mokee.eu and confirm your order number along with the products that you would like to return. If possible, share your reasons for the return, so we will be able to improve our products or service.

2. If you change your mind, you can return your order within 30 days after it being shipped subject to the below,

We offer free returns for orders shipped to the United Kingdom and with the value above £149 and below 10kgs in weight.We will provide a return label or book the collection;

We do not offer free returns for orders below £149 in value;

We do not free returns for items over 10 kgs.;

To be eligible for a refund all items are to be received by our warehouse in Europe in new, unused, not previously assembled items in their original packaging. Once we receive the items in good condition we shall process your refund;

If your order included a free promotional gift, you are obliged to return the free gift as well;

Please, note, the teething rails have been designed to fit mostly moKee cots. We can't guarantee the teething rail will fit the cots by other brands;

We accept only one return per purchase;

If the order has been delivered to another country other than the United Kingdom, you are obliged to cover the cost of return to warehouse in Europe. We will provide the details of the return address once you contact us;

You can return part or all of the order;

If you return the products within 30 days of shipment, we will refund the amount to your original payment method. The delivery fees are not returned;

Once we receive the return, we will check it, and if everything is satisfactory, we will process the refund/credit within 7 business days.

WE DO NOT OFFER REFUNDS FOR SALE ITEMS.

CANCELLATION OF ORDER

If you cancel your order before we have sent you the delivery notification, we will process the refund within 5 business days to your original payment method.

If you cancel the order after we have sent the delivery notification, our Returns & Refunds Policy shall apply

DAMAGED/ FAULTY ITEM

In the unlikely case that you received a damaged or faulty item, your order will be covered by the warranty.

The following criteria apply:
✓ For damages caused during transport - contact us within 48h of receiving the item.
✓ For manufacturing faults - contact us within the warranty period.
You should contact us at tlc@mokee.eu with the following information so that we can decide on the appropriate course of action:


✓ Your name and surname
✓ Your order's number
✓ Photos and descriptions of the fault/issue.

settings.question: Can I receive a return label?
settings.answer:
To receive the label, please, contact us via tlc@mokee.eu and provide following the details:

✓ your full name & the order's number,
✓ names & quantity of products that you would like to return,
✓ if possible, share the reasons for your return,
✓ send us pictures of products to confirm they are unused, unpacked & still in the original packaging.

settings.question: Since when is the warranty calculated?
settings.answer: The warranty is valid for 365 days since the shipping date.

settings.question: How can I contact you?
settings.answer:
If you need any advice, do not hesitate to contact us via tlc@mokee.eu and we will be more than happy to help!

We aim to get back to you today within our working hours (Monday - Friday: from 8am to 5pm).

settings.question: How to change my delivery details?
settings.answer:
If you need to change your address details, we may be able to make these changes before we dispatch your order.
Please contact us at tlc@mokee.eu with the following information so that we can decide on the appropriate course of action:

✓ Your name and surname
✓ Your order's number
✓ Your new address

settings.question: How to change or cancel your order?
settings.answer:
If you need to cancel or make some changes your order, please contact us at tlc@mokee.eu with the following information so that we can decide on the appropriate course of action:

✓ Your name and surname
✓ Your order's number

settings.question: I received my order but my item is damaged, faulty or missing. What should I do?
settings.answer:
In the unlikely case that an item is damaged, faulty or missing, our warranty will cover you if you meet the following criteria:

✓ For damages caused during transport - contact us within 48h of receiving the item.
✓ For manufacturing faults - contact us within the warranty period.
✓ For missing products - contact us within 48h of receiving the item.

Please contact us at tlc@mokee.eu with the following information so that we can decide on the appropriate course of action:

✓ Your name and surname
✓ Your order's number
✓ Photos and descriptions of the fault

settings.question: What type of payment do you accept?
settings.answer:
We accept the following major payment method:

✓ PayPal,

✓ debit & credit cards,


✓ Google Pay,

✓ Apple Pay,

✓ Klarna - Buy now, pay later.


In case of any difficulties at processing the payment, please, contact us via tlc@mokee.eu and we will try to help & advise.

settings.question: OFFERS - terms & conditions
settings.answer:
1. Offers are not redeemable for cash and cannot be used to purchase gift cards.

2. moKee offers cannot be applied to previously placed orders or products not in stock at the time of purchase.

3. Only one promo code can be used at checkout.

 

4. Offers cannot be combined unless otherwise stated.

 

5. Ongoing offers are subject to change without notice.

 

6. Collections by moKee are not subject to additional discounts. When buying the collection, you can still benefit from free gifts if offered.

settings.question: How does moKee Loyalty Program work?
settings.answer: All details regading moKee Loyalty Program can be found on the following page: https://en.mokee.eu/pages/loyalty-program

settings.banner_cap: We are deeply saddened by the death of Her Majesty The Queen. She faithfully served the nation with a quiet determination and selfless devotion. While being Monarch she has raised a loving family whom she adored. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to The Royal family.
